channel.title: Bronze Age Client Question
channel.description:
Hello,
I got this client: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461231.0.html
And I cannot find where to change the ip... I looked for a GUI.java or EGUI.java and there is not one in the folder, in the client.java I cannot seem to find the ip. So at the moment I am held up and cannot move on since it is not working. Any chance someone knows how to change it? Please tell me what to look for and what to search for so I know. Thanks.
